text:
int fact ( int n ) ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n + 1 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } if ( n == 1 ) { printf ( "%d
" , n ) ; } else { int num = 1 , count = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( i == n - 1 ) { count = count + fact ( num ) ; } else if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) { num ++ ; } else if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { count = count + fact ( num ) ; num = 1 ; } } if ( count == 2 ) { printf ( "%d
" , count + 1 ) ; } else { printf ( "%d
" , count ) ; } } } } int fact ( int n ) { if ( n == 1 ) { return 1 ; } return n * fact ( n - 1 ) ; }
